subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Another melt down?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I think everyone takes this stuff way tooooooo serious, with too many
expectations. I don't care about heavan, the afterlife, or crossing over
spirits, or getting the proof, I let "them" talk, and I listen. Not gonna
judge what "they" say, and not gonna get offended if it doesn't fit my world
view( or lack of world view). They tell me earth is doomed, I don't care!  *Que
Sera, Sera (Whatever Will Be, Will Be).*
**
 I don't know anything, and I don't wanna know anything. Everything started
from nothing, so the only true reality is nothing. Meditate on nothing--be
nothing! Nothing is everything, when you become nothing, you are everything,
you know everything. Nothing to it!

 Yeah, get that past the ego filters.

F-S
